Card.RulesText: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player simultaneously sacrifices the artifact and returns the artifact card to the battlefield.

Card.Name: Junk Diver
Card.RulesText: Flying When Junk Diver dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Covetous Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.

Card.Name: Platinum Angel
Card.RulesText: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

Card.Name: Myr Battlesphere
Card.RulesText: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

Card.Name: Sundering Titan
Card.RulesText: When Sundering Titan enters or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

Card.Name: Darksteel Colossus
Card.RulesText: Trample, indestructible If Darksteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Darksteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

Card.Name: Sensei's Divining Top
Card.RulesText: {1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

Card.RulesText: {T}: Target player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.) {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Codex Shredder: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Crucible of Worlds
Card.RulesText: You may play lands from your graveyard.
